data.Name: Louis Prima Jr.: Doo Wop Swing Band
data.Description: The Community Concerts of the Grand Valley is celebrating the 77th season with six shows you won't want to miss. Theatre Doors Open 45 Minutes Prior to Show September 20th: Ted Vigil: John Denver Musical Tribute! | 7:30 PM October 8th: Taylor Red: Country Artist Triplets | 7:30PM January 13, 2022: Sons of Serendip Classical Crossover Quartet | 7:30 PM February 27: Let's Rock Broadway starring The Diamonds | 3:00 PM April 28, 2022: Louis Prima Jr. Doo Wop Swing Band | 7:30 PM May 7, 2022: Crocodile Rockin' Elton John Tribute with Jim Witter | 7:30 PM
